title: Looking to buy Cy Young Portrait in PSA
author: Marty

posts.post_title: Looking to buy Cy Young Portrait in PSA
posts.post_content:
Hey all, I'm down to one last card for a set of 518 and Cy is the guy...his portrait variation to be exact.  Looking for a PSA-graded sample; please let me know if you have one.

Marty
